Get growth curves giving weight as a function of age

Edit this page.   Source: R/plots.R
getGrowthCurves.Rd

If given a MizerSim object, uses the growth rates at the final time of a simulation to calculate the size at age. If given a MizerParams object, uses the initial growth rates instead.

getGrowthCurves(object, max_age = 24)

Arguments

object

MizerSim or MizerParams object
max_age

The age up to which the weight is to be plotted. Default is 20

Value

An array (species x age) containing the weight in grams.

Examples


data(NS_species_params_gears)
data(inter)
params <- suppressMessages(set_multispecies_model(NS_species_params_gears, inter))
getGrowthCurves(params)

sim <- project(params, effort=1, t_max=20, t_save = 2, progress_bar = FALSE)
getGrowthCurves(sim, max_age = 24)
